description: Hands-on missions for chapter 14 using comprehensions, map/filter, and zip to transform and combine collections.

practices.title: Mission: Even Squares with List Comprehension

solution.notes: Learner should use a list comprehension with an if filter to build a list of squares of even numbers from an input list.
Learner should use a set comprehension to build a set of distinct name lengths from a list of names.

practices.title: Mission: Combine Names and Scores with zip

solution.notes: Learner should use zip (and optionally a dict comprehension) to build a dictionary mapping names to scores from two parallel lists.

practices.title: Mission: Filter Long Words and Uppercase Them

solution.notes: Learner should either use filter+map or a single list comprehension to keep words of length >= 5 and convert them to uppercase.
